lq_apy_display:
Link to APR calculations
This APR indicates the estimated return from LQ market participation rewards. It is a calculation based on the updated dynamic emissions formulae (3-day epoch). The displayed APRs are purely informational and based on estimates that change over time. The displayed APRs are not financial, investment, tax, legal, or technical advice. Any use of decentralized finance protocols involves various financial risks. Nothing displayed in this app is financial advice and it is your responsibility to complete due diligence (do your own research).
ada_proof_of_stake_info: The interest earned on supplied ADA in Liqwid is {{apy}}%. The ADA staking reward is {{proofOfStakeApy}}% (calculated based on the average of the last 10 epochs). The formula used to calculate this is: Net ADA Supplier APY = (Total deposited ADA x Supplier APY) + (Total deposited ADA (1-Utilization Rate) x Staking APY)
select_all_stakes: Select all or the first {{count}} stakes
healthfactor_calculation: HF = collateral value in $ x liquidation threshold / borrow value in $
api_new_version:
A new API version is available.
Refresh the page to update and ensure proper functionality.
delisted_tag_info: The {{id}} market has been disabled. The price is no longer being updated since {{id}} is no longer a collateral or debt asset, but users can freely withdraw {{id}} from the protocol.
private_tag_info: Access to the {{id}} market is restricted, supplying or borrowing {{id}} is not allowed.

dashboard.title: Liqwid Finance
dashboard.description: Explore the future of DeFi on Cardano with Liqwid Finance innovative lending and borrowing platform.

loans.title: Liqwid Finance - Loans
loans.description: Explore the complete list of all loans available on the Liqwid App.

liquidations.title: Liqwid Finance - Liquidations
liquidations.description: View the full history of liquidated loans on the Liqwid App.

governance.title: Liqwid Finance - Governance
governance.description: Participate in the governance of Liqwid Finance by voting on key proposals.

staking.title: Liqwid Finance - Staking
staking.description: Earn rewards and participate in governance by staking your assets on the Liqwid App.

faucet.title: Liqwid Finance - Faucet
faucet.description: Acquire test tokens to use in your applications and experiment with DeFi features without any risk.

notifications.title: Liqwid Finance - Notifications
notifications.description: Never miss an important update with Liqwid App's Notifications.

delegate_action.title: Liqwid Finance - Delegate
delegate_action.description: Delegate your LQ to another address.

nav.notification: Please make sure you're visiting v2.liqwid.finance - bookmark it to be safe.
nav.preview_banner: You're visiting the Preview testnet V2 app

supply_list.title: Your Supplies
supply_list.connect_wallet: Connect your wallet to see your supplies

tooltip.balance: Supplies is the total amount of tokens you have deposited in the protocol
tooltip.apy: APY (Annual Percentage Yield) for each asset
tooltip.locked_collateral: Locked as collateral refers to the amount of assets used as security when borrowing

borrow_list.title: Your Borrows
borrow_list.connect_wallet: Connect your wallet to see your borrows

tooltip.debt: Total amount borrowed by the user and the amount required to repay the loan.
tooltip.apy: Annual interest rate paid by the borrower for the loan
tooltip.health_factor: When the health factor reaches 1.00, your position can be liquidated
tooltip.LTV: LTV is the ratio of the loan amount to the value of the collateral
tooltip.health_factor_low: Your health factor is currently low, if it reaches 1.0, you could be liquidated

transaction_history.title: Transaction History
transaction_history.connect_wallet: Connect your wallet to access your transaction history and start using Liqwid.
transaction_history.empty_history:
No transactions yet.
Once activity begins, it will appear here.
transaction_history.empty_filtered:
No transactions found for the selected filters.
Try adjusting your filters or date range.

action.modify_collateral_description: You can modify your collateral distribution
action.asset_can_be_used_as_collateral: Assets that can be used as collateral
action.no_collateral_available: No collateral available, please supply some first

success.submit_transaction: Your transaction was successfully submitted. It will reflect on the app shortly. <0>View Status</0>

info.max_borrow_cap_reached: Your max borrow has reached the borrow cap.
info.borrow_cap_reached: The borrow cap for {{id}} has been reached. Please try again later.
info.utilization_cap_reached: The utilization cap for {{id}} has been reached. Please try again later.
info.max_supply_cap_reached: Your max supply amount of {{maxSupply}} {{id}} exceeds the limit allowed due to the current supply cap. The maximum you can supply in a single transaction is {{supplyCap}} {{id}}. Multiple transactions may be required for the full amount.
info.supply_cap_reached: The supply cap for {{id}} has been reached. Please try again later.
info.max_withdraw_cap_reached: Your max withdraw amount of {{maxWithdraw}} {{id}} exceeds the limit allowed due to the current utilization cap. The maximum you can withdraw in a single transaction is {{withdrawCap}} {{id}}. Multiple transactions may be required for the full amount.
info.wash_borrow: This is a wash borrow loan, you only have the option to either partially or fully repay the loan.
info.epoch_transition: The epoch transition is in progress. Please wait or come back later.
info.simulation_mode: You are currently in simulation mode. No actual transactions are being made. You are either not connected or don't have any available collateral.
info.wallet_not_connected: You're currently not connected. No actual transactions can be made.

error.min_ada: You need to have at least {{minAda}} ADA to perform an action on the platform.
error.batching_expired: This market require a batch to be accessible, please wait for the next batch.
error.min_health_factor: Minimum health factor needs to be {{minHealthFactor}}
error.min_health_factor_safe_mode: Borrowing {{amount}} {{asset}} will reduce your loan health below {{minHealthFactor}}, increasing your risk of liquidation. To proceed, please disable Safe Mode.
error.min_health_factor_safe_mode_modify: Modifying your loan will reduce your loan health below {{minHealthFactor}}, increasing your risk of liquidation. To proceed, please disable Safe Mode.
error.max_collaterals_reached: The maximum collateral you can add is {{maxCollaterals}}.
error.max_collateral: You cannot add more collateral of {{asset}} than you currently hold.

borrow_action.title: Borrow {{id}}
borrow_action.collateral_description: Choose the collateral for your loan

error.min_value_non_negative_collateral: You need to have a non-negative collateral value to borrow

error.min_value: Minimum amount to borrow more is {{minValue}} {{id}}

error.min_debt: You cannot repay an amount that would leave your loan below {{minValue}} {{id}}. Please either repay the loan fully or reduce your repayment amount.
error.insufficient_for_full_repay: You cannot repay an amount that would leave your loan below {{minValue}} {{id}}. Please add {{remainingDebt}} {{id}} to your wallet to repay the loan fully.

modify_action.title: Modify loan
modify_action.please_modify_to_save: Please, modify a collateral to save

error.bad_rest: You cannot be left with a supply under {{minValue}} {{id}}, please withdraw all instead or enter a lower amount.

error.max_amount_under_min_value: You can only liquidate the full amount of the loan because the remaining debt is under the minimum value of {{minValue}} {{id}}
error.liquidation_profit_negative: Your liquidation profit is negative, you will liquidate at a loss.
error.under_min_value_remaining: You can either liquidate the full debt of {{debt}} {{id}} or liquidate less than {{debtMinusMinValue}} {{id}}, as the loan debt must always be greater than {{minValue}} or closed
error.max_amount_under_min_value_x2: You can only liquidate the full amount of {{debt}} {{id}}

tooltip.liquidate_info: When health factor is 1.00 or lower, liquidation is possible

market_details.title: {{id}} details
market_details.collateralization_against: {{id}} is enabled as collateral against these debt assets

tooltip.market_utxo: The number of unique accounts/pools in a market that users can interact with at a given moment in time. Liquidity in a market is spread across these accounts more or less evenly. If all the accounts are being interacted with simultaneously, new users will need to wait until these interactions complete until they can submit actions.
tooltip.hardcap_price: The hard cap is a safety mechanism designed to prevent a market's price from exceeding a certain threshold. It is updated frequently to reflect market conditions.
tooltip.batching_explanation: Batching redistributes liquidity across all UTXOs in the market at regular intervals. The interval shows how often this occurs, while the last batch shows when liquidity was last redistributed.

utilization_graph.include_ada_staking: This APY includes the ADA staking rewards for ADA that aren't borrowed
